title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, November 20, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Nadine Gordimer (1923) who said, "Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Nadine Gordimer (1923) who said, "Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is."
